an7.47:1.1: Tena → ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. tena (bj, sya-all)
an7.47:7.1: samārambhati → samārabbhati (si, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr); samārabhati (sya-all) | hantuṃ → haññantu (si, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed) | yaññatthāya → yaññatthāyāti (bj, sya-all)
an7.47:17.5: vāto → vāyo (bj) | upavāyatan”ti → vāyatūti (bj); upavāyatūti (sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
